overview: After his performance in 1961, he never wanted to do a tv show. It was a strange thing to know that millions of people were watching him on tv instead of going to the theatre and buying a ticket.  But luckily he decided to do another performance for tv included, reaching 94% of the public
tagline: The third recorded tv show of Toon Hermans
title: Toon Hermans: One Man Show 1965
